name: Re Cursed
description:
This game will test your mathematical abilities plus your dodge and shoot mechanics. Quick math will be your friend. Press R/esc if you are stuck.

Winner Of BGDJam 2021

The Dark Souls Equivalent of Your Math's Textbook

Match the Key in the top right with your target (door or boss) to progress.

TSM's submission for BGDJam2021

Controls:

WASD = move

left click = shoot

e = use/open door

r = reset/recurse/respawn

esc = mini guide

Just extract and play. 

 Mr. Adit, this one's for you.

OTW apartemen TamSur kalo menang
